description: It's the craft that magically turns into more crafts! Learn how to make it at home.
alt: A stack of colorful homemade play dough

description: What's the cutest critter in the animal kingdom? There's a correct answer to this question and that answer is PENGUINS.
alt: Penguin made out of popsicle sticks and other craft items

description: Make some dinosaur feet and roam the house like you're starring in Jurassic Park
alt: Homemade three-toed dinosaur coverings on top of feet

idea: Turn a Cardboard Box into a Knight's Sword & Shield
description: Why play with a fancy toy when the box it comes in is so much fun!
alt: Boy wielding a sword and shield made from a cardboard box

idea: Bring a classic children's book to life
description: Eric Carle is a legendary children's author. Bring his hungry caterpillar to life!
alt: A paper crafted caterpillar with a book in the background
